before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3vh2f","text":"Warm all solutions to 37 deg C and prepare biosafety cabinet by starting the blower and wiping down all surfaces with 70% ethanol.  Organize your workspace in the biosafety cabinet to have all clean/fresh reagents on one side and all waste on the other.  Anything you will be taking into the biosafety cabinet should also be wiped clean using 70% ethanol and paper towels","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"25t3g","text":"Volumes used in this protocol are for 75 cm2flask; proportionally reduce or increase amount of dissociation medium for culture vessels of other sizes. Corning T-75 flasks (catalog #430641) are recommended for subculturing this product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":43,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"e1e69","text":"Most human cell lines are vulnerable to infection by the microbes on your skin, be careful to work aseptically to avoid contaminating your cultures and keep yourself safe. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"24ih9","text":"Complete Growth Medium containing Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s Medium (DMEM) (ATCC 30-2002). To make the  complete growth medium, add the following components to the base medium:  10% Fetal Bovine Serum (heat inactivated) (ATCC 30-2020), 2mM  L-glutamine (ATCC 30-2214), 1% Penicillin/Streptomycin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g6jd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2u0sl","text":"Sterile 6 cm plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21b19","text":"Trypsin-EDTA solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frm0n","text":"sterile serological pipettes (1mL and 10 mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crqdq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cjal0","text":"Remove and discard culture medium, by tipping dish carefully to one side and aspirating the media without disturbing the adherent cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3o1r6","text":"Briefly rinse the cell layer with   0.05% (w/v) Trypsin - 53 mM EDTA solution to remove all traces of serum which contains trypsin inhibitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c3lqs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.0","error":false,"guid":"0B0257F0ADCC11ED9EEF6BE1A19BB2E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"392tn","text":"Add   of Trypsin-EDTA solution to flask and observe cells under an inverted microscope until cell layer is dispersed (about  ). Note: To avoid clumping do not agitate the cells by hitting or shaking the flask while waiting for the cells to detach. Cells that are difficult to detach may be placed at 37°C to facilitate dispersal. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":124,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6otpi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.0","error":false,"guid":"241960D0ADCC11ED9EEF6BE1A19BB2E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3BEBB4B0ADCC11ED9EEF6BE1A19BB2E3","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m3j","text":"Add   of complete growth medium and aspirate cells by gently pipetting. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9akgq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"45F01910ADCC11ED9EEF6BE1A19BB2E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cmsc1","text":"Remove   of cell suspension for the hemocytometer. Average the count of the four-corners and multiply by 10,000 (104) to get concentration (cells/mL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":115,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"329di","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"FB5356F0ADCC11ED9EEF6BE1A19BB2E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a2eij","text":"Seed new plates with the recommended amount from the table.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o2o3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ebhn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbgo2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100,100],"data":[["","Surface Area (cm^3)","Seeding Density (10^6)","Cells at confluency (10^6)"],["Plates","","",""],["6-well","9.6","0.3","1.2"],["12-well","3.5","0.1","0.5"],["96-well","0.32","0.01","0.04"],["Flasks","","",""],["T-25","25","0.7","2.8"],["T-75","75","2.1","8.4"],["T-175","175","4.9","23.3"]],"guid":"96CA76C0ADCF11ED9EEF6BE1A19BB2E3","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"A_2":[4,1],"A_6":[4,1]},"printData":[["","Surface Area (cm^3)","Seeding Density (10^6)","Cells at confluency (10^6)"],["Plates","","",""],["6-well","9.6","0.3","1.2"],["12-well","3.5","0.1","0.5"],["96-well","0.32","0.01","0.04"],["Flasks","","",""],["T-25","25","0.7","2.8"],["T-75","75","2.1","8.4"],["T-175","175","4.9","23.3"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

title: Passaging and plating A549 cells
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"63s19","text":"A549 cells like most human cell lines host adenovirus and other transmissible pathogens. Only handle closed containers or denatured homogenates outside of a biosafety cabinet.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
